name: UBER: Base case — growth + cash generation supports the thesis
description: Normal world: we want healthy growth, strong free cash flow, reasonable valuation, and non-escalating risk headlines.

claims.statement: Revenue is still growing at a healthy pace
Free cash flow is positive (business generates real cash)
Free cash flow margin is solid (company converts sales into cash)
Valuation is not expensive versus cash (FCF yield is decent)
Recent news shock is not severe (not a headline crisis)
Insurance risk is not spiking recently
Regulatory risk is not spiking recently
Labor risk is not spiking recently
Debt burden is manageable (net debt <= ~3.0 years of free cash flow)
